blogPost.excerpt:
Join me as I attempt to live for 24 hours in this 10 foot giant costume.              Get Current and learn more here: https://www.current.com/garrett

Halloween and all spooky things are my favorite things in the world and this year I didn't want to not just celebrate Halloween, I actually wanted to become halloween. For a full day. So I bought this absurdly expensive giant costume and I lived a day in my life in it. I love this video so much and making it with Andrew Siwicki was a highlight of my actual year. 

Follow Me:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/garrett_watts
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/garrett_watts
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@garrett_watts?source=h5_m

Thank you for watching the things that I make and I love you.
